text: P. King Duckling is an animated children's television series. It was co- created by Josh Selig, Chen Gu, and Bo Fan. It debuted on Disney Junior in the United States on November 7, 2016 and ended it on May 11, 2017. It is about the title character, a young duck, who has adventures in the town of Hilly Hole with his two best friends, Chumpkins and Wombat. Category:2016 American television series debuts Category:Children's television series Category:Children's entertainment
title: P. King Duckling
